website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for those who are passionate about using green, cruelty-free cleaning products.
pros: Unlike most cleaners, this product doesn't contain VOCs, alkyphenol surfactants, or petroleum
Reviewers love the citrus smell that lingers in the air after cleaning
Also works on tile, marble, bamboo, and vinyl
cons: You might need to rinse after cleaning for best results

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! I'm a homecleaner and needed to find a non toxic product that actually works, and this does! I've found that it needs to be diluted (1/4 simply floored to 3/4 water) and put in a spray bottle. This helps with the problems people are having with the floors being sticky (it shouldn't suds up when you're mopping!) So with a little trial and error this works the best! Plus it lasts way longer now that I'm diluting it. And the scent is really light and clean smelling without being terrible. Definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A.

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful, and cleans so very well !
customer_reviews.text: I rate this floor cleaner a 4.5 of 5.0 ! Con: the price is a bit high unless you are a Prime member, HOWEVER, do not miss the chance to purchase this cleaner !! It has a nice light minty/citrus scent that does not affect my allergies, because its mostly essential oils! I use it around pets and children with no side effects, and the duty it does on grimy floors is amazing! I have used it on tile, pergola, natural stone, laminated surfaces, porceIain, hardwood, and still trying out more! Highly recommend this product and company!!
customer_reviews.author: Rev Jodi Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I purchased this cleaner. I really needed a wood floor cleaner that was easy to use and all natural due to pets & my allergies. This stuff makes my floors shine and y house smell good! T put the product in a spray bottle to make it easier for me to control how much product I am using. A little bit goes a long way. And you get 2 bottles. Well worth the money! My floors are looking awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hartman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF!  I LOVE THE RESULTS... READ MY TIPS BEFORE YOU START...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE THIS STUFF! Reordering right now. You will read in some reviews that it was sudsy, and that is because they has squirted too much cleaner on the floor. Do small sections at a time. I used a microfiber mop and got beautiful results. PLEASE NOTE YOU NEED A BUCKET OF CLEAN WATER TO RINSE YOUR MOP EVERY COUPLE OF SECTIONS. IF NOT, YOU ARE MOPPING YOUR FLOOR WITH A DIRTY MOP. Change that water too, for every room. Make sure all dirt and dust is vacuumed off the floor before using the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Question
customer_reviews.text: This is a question. I got a 2 pack and one is very yellow with bits floating around (almost like lemonade) and the other is clear with no bits (like the one I revived before). What is going on? Is one faulty?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You be the judge... Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best floor cleaner I have ever come across! I use it mostly on our hardwood floor & a little area of linoleum! With little effort, it always comes out clean with lots of shine! I really like the scent also. Because of the natural ingredients, I do not have to worry about allergies & sensitivities!
customer_reviews.author: S&R

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Used a very small quantity, like little over a table spoonful of the cleaner in the water dispenser. Left the floor sticky. Tried only teaspoonful, same results. Might be good for dirty floors, ours were clean to start with, wife just likes to mop. No Joke.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: BEST NON-TOXIC WOOD FLOOR CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: I saw these products advertised on Shark Tank and thought I would given them a try. It really resonated with me that the creators of the product were concerned about the health of their family as well as the environment. I am not a fan of chemical based products as they are not only toxic to humans and pets but also the environment. Not the case, here. This product leaves my home clean and my floors shiny. The best wood cleaner that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use anything else again.
customer_reviews.text: I rescue senior dogs, most are relinquished by owners due to old age incontinence. I am also a clean freak. Believe me, I have tried MANY cleaning products! This is hands down the best I've found anywhere. I was hesitant to try it because I doubted a natural cleaner would be strong enough to cut through urine smell. Ha! I was so wrong. This cleaner cleans so thoroughly and immediately cuts all odors with a nice fresh natural scent. You could walk in my house and never guess I even had a dog, much less 3 little old men that can't hold their pee any more. Buy this. Trust me you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: With kids and pets, natural cleaning products are a must for me! I really didn’t care for the smell of the product and didn’t feel like it did that great of a job cleaning. I was pretty disappointed because I really wanted to like this product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Out Shines Other Brands
customer_reviews.text: With the installation of hardwood floors in our home, I went with the name brand product. It worked fine putting a shine on the floor but it did nothing as far as cleaning goes. I read the reviews on this product, and while hesitant to try a plant-based product for fear of it being a waste of money, I discovered this is the only way to go! This product works! Right now I am trying to get through the buildup produced by the brand name floor cleaning product. I like that it is environmentally safe, but equally important, it does what it says it will do. This product is proof you can teach and old dog new tricks!
customer_reviews.author: Superior.Shores

customer_reviews.title: Makes suds - has to leave a film
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this on any floors yet, but did use it to wash out my flat chenille mop head that I use with Bruce floor cleaner. It made an awful lot of suds and I can't imagine that just squirting it on the floor and wiping with a damp mop would actually clean the floor without leaving a film of whatever made those suds. I did not like the odor either, and I use other products with essential oils that leave a very pleasant odor, if any. I'll not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: V. W.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome, leaves my floor super clean and smelling great! Not like Aunt Fannies Vinegar Wash Floor Cleaner Eucalyptus, 32 oz, that smell like vinegar and does not do the job. Thank you so much. 😃👍
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my tile floor with this product it smell clean and cleaned my floors. I have been using vinegar this topped all!!!
customer_reviews.author: glenda

customer_reviews.title: Works great and healthy for your pets and kids!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought be a bottle of this a few years ago, and now that we have vinyl floors throughout the house I am using it a lot more often. I love the smell and it gets my floors super clean. It only takes a little to clean a lot. Love this product so came back to Amazon to re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Haz

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Floors look nice right after you use it but it leaves a film on the floor and if you have someone wearing tennis shoes with a rough sole, you have foot prints all over the floor. It would be too expensive to return it but will never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cleaner, smells even better!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite cleaner! It is so easy to use, whether you just squirt it straight on to spot clean, or dilute it for and entire room. Even sticky messes just come right up, and the floor is clean and bright. But the best thing about this cleaner is the SMELL! The scent of this cleaner is out of this world great! It’s like a garden spearmint mixed with a fresh but light citrus scent. I enjoy getting the cleaner out so my house smells so great for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: MJF Lime

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a film and footprints
customer_reviews.text: Definitely leaves a film and footprints will be seen. My product came in amber bottles but the solution inside was clear. I used this with a swiffer type mop that sprays the solution out a dispenser. Solution worked great with the mop but overall Im disappointed with the film it left. I bought because it was pet and kid friendly but ill probably try another brand after I use these up.
customer_reviews.author: Farrington

customer_reviews.title: The small bottles are better value for money
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this floor cleaner as a floor cleaner and a counter top cleaner for years. I bought this giant box thinking it would be cheaper but it actually comes out more per oz than the bottles, which is a bummer because I'm trying to completely cut plastic waste. This cleaner is amazing. I hate that the packaging is like cough medicine bottle, but I have an old bottle I pour into. The company sold to a conglomerate so I think that's what's going on. amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: First time using. So far I love it. Tile floor looks awesome. I especially love that it is non toxic for my family and pets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best floor cleaner we've ever used
customer_reviews.text: A lot of other floor cleaners I have tried to leave a sticky residue on the floor, this one never does and it actually cleans the floor. There's not much of a scent for those that don't like scents. And it lasts fairly long for a 900 sqft condo
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very old house, that hasn't been well taken care of. Our kitchen floor holds onto dirt like its it's job, and nothing has ever cleaned it before. We've tried all sorts of products, even scrubbing it on our hands and knees. I used this yesterday with a mop and it worked! My floor is so much cleaner, it actually got the dirt up. My house smells beautiful too, like mint.
customer_reviews.author: Gill T

customer_reviews.title: Not What I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to try this on my wood floors. It’s har to find anything that will not leave a film on them, even plain water. I tried it and just like all other cleaners, it left a film. I regret this purchase. I will try diluting it with water to see if that helps. I was under the impression that this did not contain wax. It left the floor sticky and you could see prints on the floor after you walked on it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend - great product!
customer_reviews.text: Tried because of positive reviews and agree: This floor cleaner is wonderful. Just squirt on your floor, spread it around with a mop (or towel or rag or paper towel), then mop with slightly watered-down mop (recently got the O'Cedar mop and bucket which is perfect for this). The scent is fresh and clean. Now that I'm doing my own cleaning and moppingmy Amtico floors all the time, I'm glad to have found something safe to use. And I've already bought another two bottles to make sure I always have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Larue

customer_reviews.title: Pet friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaner for my hardwood floors and tiles in my kitchen because I have dogs who are messy! I love the fact it’s plant based so if they licked the floors, they won’t get sick. Comes in squirt bottle and smells fresh n citrusy. A lil goes a long way. I get these every other month through my subscription. Highly recommend if you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective on cleaning my dirty floors and soft scent
customer_reviews.text: My husband complains of bleach smell when I mop so I used the Better Life floor cleaner. They left my floors super clean which is hard with my dog who likes to run inside from outside. And they left the house with a soft pleasant scent, not harsh or overwhelming like bleach. A little goes a long way if you go by the instructions on the bottle. Great product. I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Graciousroz

customer_reviews.title: I like this cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I really like the products by Better Life. They have a bunch of really good items. I love the scent of the floor cleaner. I gave it 4 stars for easy to clean because it leaves a bit of a soapy streak on my laminate floors. It does really well on tile.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Williams

customer_reviews.title: Found my new floor cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I mixed it with water, even though it says you don’t need it. It works amazingly. My floors don’t have that sheen I was having an issue with using other products. It smells amazing, like my husband walks in and is like oh my god you cleaned today it smells so good. I have two small babes under age 3 so I can rest assured while they are rolling around on the floor that they aren’t rolling in a bunch of chemicals. Will continue to purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Astorga

customer_reviews.title: Terrific fragrance and works quite well
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is refreshing and not cloying. The dispenser is a simple squirt bottle. This works very well with my steam mop on vinyl floors, removes doggie mistakes and leaves behind that fresh scent. I’m getting more this week.
customer_reviews.author: ELK

customer_reviews.title: Sprays out A LOT of product
customer_reviews.text: I went through this bottle almost 3x faster then the Method floor cleaner, and it's the same amount of product. I think it might have to do with the spray top dispensing a lot more product in comparison to Methods bottle. The scent was very very light, and once I mopped the area I could no longer smell it. Again, as a comparison to Method's floor cleaner, in my opinion it doesn't compare.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa S.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging problem
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the containers leaked in the plastic bag (the seal was not centered on the top of the bottle) and plastic squirt top was broken off. This is a packaging problem not a delivery problem. Have not used product yet but smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bingonana

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Guy's
customer_reviews.text: It's true a little bit does go a long way it really does cut the dirt right off your floors plus I use a steam mop with this stuff and I think my floors as clean and shiny as ever
customer_reviews.author: Big Dawg !

customer_reviews.title: THIS SOLUTION WORKS
customer_reviews.text: My floors look much cleaner. I diluted the solution about 1/2 and 1/2 with water. A bit sticky on bare feet at first but dries w/out stickiness. I advise to clean your floor while wearing socks (preferably his--white men's socks like my Mom always did.)
customer_reviews.author: Donna Averett

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the hoopla is, I found this product to be inferior to most other floor cleaners. I used it on multiple surfaces, all of which were recommended safe for use. And it was safe, but ineffectively cleans. Left surfaces dull looking as well. I feel a plain damp mop would have done a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this floor cleaner!! I’ve been using it with my Bissell Crosswave instead of the Bissell formula and it works great!! I wanted a more natural option and this is perfect! A little goes a long way and is worth the price. Doesn’t leave any grime or residue on the floor. I love it! Scent is light but smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Happymama

customer_reviews.title: Smell is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff first of all smells amazing! We use it on our wood laminate floors and it works great. We wanted to switch to some more eco friendly cleaning products and were surprised it worked so well in our house especially since we have two dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Misa L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad first impression
customer_reviews.text: Got my cleaner today and the box has a giant wet hole in it. When I opened the box I found soaked contents and one of the bottles with its top partially unscrewed. I’m sure someone dropped the box-but items clearly were not packaged well. Terrible first impression. Other than that, the cleaner does smell nice and it didn’t burn or anything when it got all over my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca silverman

customer_reviews.title: No fancy packaging. But oh so worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because of the high ratings. And they are correct. Didnt smell like anything special directly from the bottle. But after using to mop the floor. The whole house smelled amazing. Misture of hard wood laminate ans tile throught my home. And it worked amazing. Smelled amazing. Would buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Samantha ross

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Since hoping on the essential oil bandwagon a year back I have been obsessed with oils and cleaning with them. However, after seeing how much oils cost and how it can ruin families and relationships, I have witnessed it, I needed to try other options, so since this cleaner has grapefruit, peppermint and bergamot I thought I would try it. The product works great and smells great. Now my floors are clean and my wallet it fat!
customer_reviews.author: geniphre

customer_reviews.title: Definitely dilute before using.
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be diluted A LOT to avoid sudsing and residue. Once you dilute it (one part cleaner to three parts water) it still cleans well. The scent is subtle and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Krois

customer_reviews.title: Great to use, love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome to use with our spray mop. I even watered it down to save some money and it still worked great and makes the place smell clean without having a nasty chemical odor. We used it on a day I had a migraine and the scent didn't make that worse.
customer_reviews.author: L Doud

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better price
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing for 2 toddlers and a German Shepherd dog. I have dirty floors almost all the time! This takes up all the spilled juice, food and dirt. I used the advice of 1/3 water and it still works and smells like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. With natural products, I find a lot of them don't smell very good but this smells good and the scent is very subtle.
customer_reviews.author: LorenaW

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I bough this when my usual brand became unavailable and it didn't disappoint. The scent is fresh and clean and redolent with essential oils. No chemical smell at all. It cleans well and is light. The only thing I would change is a sturdier bottle, but all in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Always reliable products!
customer_reviews.text: Love Better Life EVERYTHING. Fresh smelling, easy to apply. I use it on our bamboo and natural slate floors....constantly. No need to use a bucket of water! Just squirt it on, wipe it off. Dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Pvknitter

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with Shark Steam Mop
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing with the Shark Steam Mop! We have hardwood floors throughout and it worked great. Shine and the floor was super smooth. On top of that the scent is not over powering. The house looks, feels, and smells clean after using this! Easy to apply and a little does go a long way (as it states in the bottle). I put a few squirts directly on the hardwood floor and you are good to go. This may differ if you are not using a steam mop.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin C Bower

customer_reviews.title: NO RESIDUE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product, and all Better Life products, make my life easier! Simply point, squirt, mop! That's it! A little goes a long way! There is NO residue on my hardwood (real) floors or on my tile! It smells so nice and clean, and the fact my dogs and children are safe, is definitely a benefit. I am so glad I found this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, smells good and a fair price. However, it left a sticky residue on our laminate floors. Super bummed. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: E's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works good, Very concentrated
customer_reviews.text: This formula is very concentrated. So you really need to dilute it A LOT with water. If not, it leaves a sticky residue. I put some in a spray bottle with water & then spray on the floor before cleaning. It works good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lavach-Savy

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, safe  and clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a cleaning business and need products that are safe and can handle a tough clean! This product was recommended nto me by a property owner who had a lot of allergies and was sensitive to fragrances and chemicals. I switched over and have been thrilled with the results. Healthy & clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B Good

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Love ,love , love this floor cleaner!! Does a fantastic job on my tile floors . Finally found product that doesn’t leave streaks. Will definitely buy again! Only con, came with one bottle open and spilled some when opening. But works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Momma C.

customer_reviews.title: Great mopping solution!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price! I have porcelain tile and dark laminate floors and this cleaner works for both. A little goes a long way! You can clean a 14 x16 floor with a wet mop and about 2 quarter sized squirts of this
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: BLSFGF.
customer_reviews.text: Better life simply floored green floor is the best! I have 3 dogs and all have allergies and I don't have to worry about it causing problems with their skin or if they lick the floor. This better life simply floored green floor cleaner really works well.. No residue on the floor and a really nice smell .. Not a chemical smell. I use it on my kitchen cabinets as well ... Base boards. I'm really surprised how well this product cleans !!! The best of it all.... THE PRICE ABSOLUTELY A GREAT BARGAN. Next thing on going to use is on my car. I am using this all the time !!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Debb Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Last 2 Deliveries of the Floor Cleaner the liquid was Brown !?
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cleaner but the Last 2 Deliveries the Floor Cleaner liquid was Brown !?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from someone that hates to mop, this product makes it less daunting. I love that you squeeze it directly onto the floor, no more mop bucket, and the scent is wonderful-- your whole house will smell so clean after you use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 year old, a dog and 2 parrots. This cleaner is AMAZING! Cleans everything so great and the peace of mind that this is completely safe and chemical free to use around my babies is perfect. My daughter likes doing crafts we had a glue adhesive stain on my floors that was impossible to remove but this stuff took it right off! As well as an old nail polish stain on tile was no match for this product. Works great to remove any dirt mud the dog tracks in as well as bird poop of cages. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to refill my O-Cedar pro-mist mop. Previously I was mixing normal cleaning solution with water and it would get musty smelling if I didn't use it in a couple of weeks. This is perfect, cleans well and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: TERRIE GILLAND

customer_reviews.title: Safe and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my vinyl kitchen and bathroom floors! And, I don't have to worry about my cats using these products! That was my biggest concern was the health of my animals, after losing one of my cats to cancer. I worried about them licking their paws after walking on the floors or where they eat. Thank you so much for the safe and natural products!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ssimms

customer_reviews.title: Safe for pets: Amazing scent. No tacky feeling after it dries.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner for my floor. The scent is amazing and the best thing about it is it is safe for pets. I mopped hours ago and it still smells wonderful. No tacky feeling left behind. Shines also. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Best Floor & Smells Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the only floor cleaner ill use. I got 2 big bottles for such a great price and the smell is amazing! Has kinda a Eucalyptus smell and it smells so clean and fresh when your done!! Definitely will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Marlman

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. All you need to use is a little. Drop on floor, get a damp mop and watch the shine. I've been looking for a good quality cleaner for my tile floor. One without bad chemicals that is safe for my dog. I finally found one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick/Peart

customer_reviews.title: Clean Floors
customer_reviews.text: Scream, shout! Cleans the grout! Really, this product is making the grout in our kitchen look like new! The big bonus is that it is non-toxic and much safer to use around our cats.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  It does all the hard work for you!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a product that cleans hardwood floors as well as this! Smells great, leaves no film whatsoever, and removes tough spots like nothing I've seen. No scrubbing! This is now my go-to floor cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Ellehoops

customer_reviews.title: LOVE BETTER LIFE PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: I love Better Life Products!! The floor cleaner is excellent on laminate and tile! Cleans spots easily and leaves a refreshing smell on your floors! You will love any product you buy from Better Life!
customer_reviews.author: Momizzy

customer_reviews.title: smells divine
customer_reviews.text: Mmmm this smells so good! I use it for more than a floor cleaner. I also feel safe using it on countertops and while cleaning my rabbits litter boxes. It makes the whole house smell good. The two bottles last quite a while and for the price, I think it's a good purchase. I would like to buy more products from Better Life and see how I feel about their products.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Problem?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product once before and love it. Not sure why the packaging was all wet inside the bubbled envelope? But I am assuming a leak from the bottles somehow, so this was disappointing thus the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: dh

customer_reviews.text: We love that its all natural and pet safe! It also smells great! A little goes a long way I accidentally used a bit to much 😅 my hard wood floors look beautiful! I Definitely will be looking into more better life products
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Yost

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of this product but I thought I would give it a try. Used it on my kitchen tile floor. It not only looked clean, but it WAS clean! No streaks, no rinsing. Safe for my dog. Anxious to try it out on my hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: LETS GO TO THE MOVIES

customer_reviews.title: Love It- Smells Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I buy it a lot! I'm very sensitive to fragrances and really dislike anything that smells too strong or has any weird smell, but this is wonderful - it has just a light, minty smell to it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells more like toothpaste than citrus fruits
customer_reviews.text: Smells a bit like toothpaste and I was hoping for more of a citrus scent to be honest, not so much mint but my cat really likes the smell and its safe for her so I appreciate that. The smell doesn’t last too long either but thats also ok. I put most of the bottle into my o-cedar microfiber mop and it cleaned my floors pretty well. Plant based cleaners, what will they come up with next?!
customer_reviews.author: Anisa Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Same as warm soap
customer_reviews.text: No difference between this and warm dawn soap on porcelain floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have 2 dogs, laminated and hardwood floors. I have to constantly mop the floors. The smell is very mild, not overpowering and it doesn't leave the floors sticky or slippery. It's almost like a mild soapy water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One cleaning solution
customer_reviews.text: I used this for cleaning houses. Can be used on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Knight

customer_reviews.title: I love Better Life products
customer_reviews.text: Another winning Better Life cleaning product. It's easy to use and doesn't leave streaks on bathroom marble and granite floors.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Clean and pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cause it is good for bamboo floor, used with electronic mop, worked well. Unlike a lot of cleaning solution, this one has mild and pleasant smell, thumb up
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Kind of expensive
customer_reviews.text: One of my clients uses this, so I reordered when I ran out. It smells nice and seems to work fine, but kind of expensive
customer_reviews.author: K. Shankey

customer_reviews.title: Smells great works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and the smell of this specific cleaner. It is a little looser in consistency than I would like though.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: So Easy and Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on my wood floors. Very easy to use I like the fact you dont need a bucket of water like traditional mopping. Cleaned pretty well. Nice light scent and no toxic fumes. Did not really see the that my floors were any shinier like a lot of peoples reviews described. Overall I was very h as happy with this product and will definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shota Mamukashvili

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work, leaves streaks
customer_reviews.text: I didn't spray it on the floor, because of the reviews saying it's too sticky. So i put water in the sink and did three squirts. foamed alright, smell not great, took forever to dry and left streak marks. won't buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. It cleans our kitchen floor so well and so fast. My husband doesnt care for the smell but I love it! Its bright and refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah GG

customer_reviews.title: Ok cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A little if used by itself. Mixed with a little water camenout a little better. Cleaned about as well as other cleaners. Didn’t see a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: SQUEAKY CLEAN FLOORS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to clean my new vinyl plank flooring in our kitchen. It leaves no sticky residue and my kitchen smells wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Norma W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this, smells wonderful and does not harm any of your animals, easy to use and refreshes your home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner for my floors. This cleaner works great and gives my floor a nice shine. Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs that occasionally have accidents. I love the fact that I don't have to rinse afterwards, and the scent is quite nice. It's a clean scent, not flowery.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Bud

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SMELL!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The smell is clean with a minty twist. My dogs love licking the floors after, lol. Everyone compliments the smell of our home after cleaning. This product cleans my floors VERY well. I dont see any residue after moping. AMAZING PRODUCT! Will be purchasing continuously. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Priestley

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and smells great !
customer_reviews.text: I feel very safe putting this on my floors with my dogs and kids. Cleans and smells great !
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great product/great price
customer_reviews.text: I have an English bulldog, I am very particular with what I use to clean the floors. This product is absolutely amazing! Lifts/cleans dirty floors, and it does not leave behind any streaks. Love this product and would recommend you buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works so well on my tile and laminate, no streaks and great scent. Will be trying other products!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This has a light fresh smell, it’s doesn’t last too long and it’s not as strong as I would like. But it does it’s job and smells good!
customer_reviews.author: Ralyssa

customer_reviews.title: Leaked an otherwise great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it leaked. Packager needs to secure better I won’t purchase here again
customer_reviews.author: somewhat ofasecret

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this cleaner. NO smell. natural, same arounf children and pets, cleans as good if not better than other major stinky cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: it makes my floor all soapy
customer_reviews.text: it makes my floors all soapy and it leaves streaks. great price, but terrible products for vinyl flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner. Mix with 25% water. No residue or stickiness. Effective on our hardwood and porcelain title floors. And nice to know is environmentally friendly.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Dull and lifeless film but smells nice.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a nice minty smell. I wanted to love it and it does get the floors clean. It just leaves a dull film over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Naturegirlangie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Cleans my dark laminate wood floors so easily. I have 4 dogs so there are constant pawprints but this product works great! Smells really good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner I've used
customer_reviews.text: This works really well - does not leave residue on my floors. I have hardwood, laminate, and tile and works great on all surfaces. Feel comfortable using with my pets and kids running around. Won't use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Just a little goes long ways
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans just as it says, really just a little goes long ways. The scent is not so strong therefore it doesn't hurt to smell it nor does it leave any headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Anana Venegas

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for mopping floors. Works great and does not bother my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Smells great and has my tile floors looking awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stubblefield

product_meta.title: Better Life Naturally Dirt-Destroying Floor Cleaner, Citrus Mint, 32 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description:
Size:32 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)The green ready-to-use floor cleaner that loses the dirt in a couple squirts. Spill some wine. Go “oops” with your soup. What’ll drop most is your jaw, because Simply Floored! will do a shiny number on tile, wood, stone, laminate, linoleum and even cement. It’s a cleaner, not a wax, so no worries about waxy build-up on your floor (or feet, for that matter).

Main Ingredients:
Soapbark: This evergreen tree is native to Chile. We take bark extract and use it as a natural cleaning agent for some of our cleaners.
Lemon: Our citrusy scents come from real fruits like lemons and oranges. Citrus limon peel extract gives cleaners that fresh, clean smell.
feature_bullets: Safely cleans and restores a brilliant shine to: hardwood, ceramic tile, stone, bamboo, vinyl, laminate, and other sealed floors
No Rinsing, No Residue: Great for cleaning daily spills or the entire floor (squirt directly on surface)
Free of VOCs, alkyphenol surfactants, and petroleum
Please note the color of the bottles for Floor Cleaner may be clear or amber-tinted. This is only temporary!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
